CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1953, pg. 4 reads: "Herron Hill Students Entertain Conference - Members of the gym classes at Herron Hill Junior High School are shown as they entertained delegates to the American Conference on Health and Physical Education at the William Penn Hotel last week. Students performed round and square dances for the delegates. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Girls and boys from Herron Hill Junior High School, including boy on left wearing plaid shirt and handkerchief around neck, dancing in couples in grand ballroom of William Penn Hotel
